case.state: Hmm... a game of strip poker? Perhaps tonight won't be so boring after all! Let's have some fun!

Aw, don't be afraid. I'll be ever so gentle.

It's a good thing I enjoy stripping for you.

Eh doesn't matter.
OH well! It was fun while it lasted.

Finally!
